name: SPECIAL FORCE DOUBLE TAKE
description:
Survival justifies any means! As one of the special agents in the world of [SPECIAL FORCE DOUBLE TAKE], you should do everything to survive among 10 opponents. Your every action must be based on your survival tactics. Will you become a wise survivor or a bloodthirsty predator? Will you play as a team or solo? How will you hunt threatening monsters to acquire lethal weapons and useful utilities? There is no answer; survival is the only answer.

Key Features

Survive or Kill

There are countless ways to be the last one in [SPECIAL FORCE DOUBLE TAKE]. If you are a defensive survivor, you should be well-prepared by hunting monsters and collecting utilities and weapons. If you are a relentless assassinator, get your gun ready, kill innocent victims, and take their items to get stronger.

Players are Not the Only Enemies

Elf archers disguise in a bush to blow your brains out, and your bullets do not work against those golems. How will you take weapons or utilities from them? You always have to take a risk to be stronger.

Guns and Knives Are Too Old to Kill Wisely

The era of guns and steel is over. Beautiful and highly advanced weapons are waiting for you. Locate enemies with high-powered LADAR and send smart drones to kill them by just pressing a single button. Even if someone finds you and tries to get closer, don’t worry; landmines will welcome them.

WELCOME TO THE WORLD OF [SPECIAL FORCE DOUBLE TAKE].
